about_the_game:
DodgeKing is a grid-based, action bullet-hell roguelite where you level up by dodging! 


Claim the Crown and Restore Order!

Dodge, hop, shield, and parry your way through the chaotic Void Monvitrese, where the crown awaits the worthy! Battle through a relentless gauntlet of robot-invaded worlds, collecting powerful upgrades and building your 'dodge-streak' as you strive to reach the bosses untouched.

Survive the Onslaught!

Bullets, missiles, bombs, lasers, holes, and traps—everything is out to stop you! Dodge and deflect an unyielding barrage, using your wits and reflexes to stay one step ahead. Whack your weapon against incoming projectiles, crush robots, and clear obstacles to make it through.

Game Features

  • Forge Your Perfect Knight:

    Every run lets you shape your knight by customizing HP, Shields, and Power while using unique abilities. With every victory, you’ll unlock more points to push your limits further with each run!

  • Evolving Foes & Epic Boss Battles:

    Descend deeper into the mysterious Void Monvitrese, where enemies evolve, becoming more unpredictable and deadly. Prove your dodging mastery as you outwit and outlast their relentless onslaught!

  • Classic Dungeon Crawling & Secrets Await:

    Venture through classic dungeon floors or endless battle arenas. Battle alongside helpers, uncover hidden rooms, and search for relic rooms to blast through the deepest secrets of the Void.

  • Synergize Relics for Ultimate Power:

    Equip your knight with powerful relics that transform your playstyle: arm yourself with guns, extend shields, swap health for power, summon allies, and more. Combine upgrades to unleash devastating combos against the robotic hordes!

  • Custom Challenge Modes for the Brave:

    Take on harder modes with EX Bosses, faster bullets, double damage, Hard Mode, or the ultimate One-Hit K.O. challenge. Mix and match these tests to prove you’re truly worthy of the crown!

short_description: DodgeKing is a rogue-lite, battle-network-inspired, action grid-based survival game. You’ll play as a knight who’ll deliver a crown through a relentless barrage of bullets, missiles, and evolving robots. Dodge, jump, shield, and slow down time; try to make it to the castle alive. No second chances.
